description: Schema for metadata/index.json. This file lists modules known to the repository and optionally the directory where their metadata is stored, the allowed package prefixes for metadata, and inter-module requirements. See docs/CONTRIBUTING.md (Metadata structure).

module.description: Maven coordinates for the module in the form '<groupId>:<artifactId>'.

directory.description: Repository-relative path under 'metadata/' containing this module's metadata (e.g. 'org.example/library'). If omitted, the entry may reference requirements only.

allowed-packages.description: List of package (or fully-qualified name) prefixes considered valid sources of metadata entries for this module. Used to filter-in relevant JSON entries.

requires.description: Optional list of module coordinates this module depends on. Each item is '<groupId>:<artifactId>'.
